Arduino and Electronics Projects

Discovering Microcontrollers and Electronics

While my academic background has been predominantly focused on software development, I've recently developed a keen interest in microcontrollers and electronics. This field strikes a perfect balance between logic and creativity, making it incredibly appealing to me.

Even though I didn't have many hardware courses in my program, I found myself drawn to the hands-on aspect of building and programming electronic circuits. One of my first projects was creating an LED matrix using an Arduino. The process of soldering the connections for data and current was both challenging and rewarding. I programmed the matrix to display a scrolling sign, and seeing it come to life was exciting.

Although I'm just starting out in this area, I'm excited to continue learning and tackling new projects.
